column9: this medicine did not work for me at all and i went up to 5 vials per dose. I was on it for about 2 weeks and then was put on estrogen and then progesterone to start my next cycle. I only tried it once and got no response due to my age/fsh level.

column1: Infertility associated with the Lack of Ovulation
column2: Hybrid Cycle , 25-34 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I started a "hybrid" cycle of Menopur with oral medication Femara preceeding.  So far, with these hormones raging, I have been in acceptionally good moods.  Maybe I am a minority when taking this, but my moods have been much better than prior to all these hormones.  I'm not as emotional as I usually have been, and have overall been feeling great.  I started the injections last night, and found it just as difficult as ripping off a band-aid or facial wax.  We will see on Saturday 4-23 what the US shows...
